KeymanPackageInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic SA
KeymanPackageInstalled.filename: C:\Documents and Settings\All Users\Application Data\Tavultesoft\Keyman\Keyboard\_Package\Greek Polytonic SA\kmp.inf

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic LS
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Greek Polytonic Keyboard based on Linguist's Software's LaserGreek®II US-transliterated keyboard layout. Please view the file «Greek Polytonic SA Keyboard Layouts.pdf» for details.
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.copyright: Copyright 2004, Saint Anthony's Greek Orthodox Monastery

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic LS EZ
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Greek Polytonic Keyboard based on Linguist's Software's LaserGreek®II US-transliterated keyboard layout. «EZ»: adds breathing marks to vowels at beginning of word. Please view the file «Greek Polytonic SA Keyboard Layouts.pdf» for details.
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.copyright: Copyright 2004, Saint Anthony's Greek Orthodox Monastery

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic LS MT
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Greek Polytonic Keyboard based on Linguist's Software's LaserGreek®II US-transliterated keyboard layout. «Monotonic»: produces vowels with «tonos» rather than «oxia», and «apostrophe» character instead of «koronis». Please view the file «Greek Polytonic SA Keyboard Layouts.pdf» for details.
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.copyright: Copyright 2004, Saint Anthony's Greek Orthodox Monastery

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic MS
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Simplified Greek Polytonic Keyboard resembling the Microsoft Windows'® Greek keyboard layout. Please view the file «Greek Polytonic SA Keyboard Layouts.pdf» for details.
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.copyright: Copyright 2004, Saint Anthony's Greek Orthodox Monastery

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic MS EZ
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Simplified Greek Polytonic Keyboard resembling the Microsoft Windows'® Greek keyboard layout. «EZ»: adds breathing marks to vowels at beginning of word. Please view the file «Greek Polytonic SA Keyboard Layouts.pdf» for details.
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.copyright: Copyright 2004, Saint Anthony's Greek Orthodox Monastery

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.name: Greek Polytonic MS MT
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Simplified Greek Polytonic Keyboard resembling the Microsoft Windows'® Greek keyboard layout. «Monotonic»: produces vowels with «tonos» rather than «oxia», and «apostrophe» character instead of «koronis». Please view the file «Greek Polytonic SA Keyboard Layouts.pdf» for details.
KeymanKeyboardInstalled.copyright: Copyright 2004, Saint Anthony's Greek Orthodox Monastery

KeymanKeyboardInstalled.message: Simplified Greek Polytonic Keyboard resembling Linguist's Software's LaserGreek®II US-transliterated keyboard layout. «Monotonic»: produces vowels with «tonos» rather than «oxia», and «apostrophe» character instead of «koronis». KeymanOption.name: koCreateStartMenuAsSubfolders
KeymanOption.description: Create Start Menu folders under 'Tavultesoft Keyman' folder

KeymanOption.name: koCreateUninstallEntries
KeymanOption.description: List keyboards in 'Add or Remove Programs' Control Panel applet

KeymanOption.name: koTurnOnSurrogates
KeymanOption.description: Turn on Unicode supplementary character display (requires restart)
